meanings.sent1: The doctor recertifies the patient's health every year.
meanings.sent2: The school recertifies teachers to ensure they meet the required standards.
meanings.sent3: The bakery recertifies its famous recipe to keep customers coming back for more.
meanings.sent4: Just like a fresh coat of paint, recertifying the document gives it a new shine.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic recertifies the safety of the car before returning it to the owner.

meanings.definition: To confirm the validity of something again
meanings.sent1: The bank recertifies the account details to prevent fraud.
meanings.sent2: The software company recertifies the security measures regularly.
meanings.sent3: The detective recertifies the evidence to ensure a fair trial.
meanings.sent4: The scientist recertifies the experiment results for accuracy.
meanings.sent5: The auditor recertifies the financial records to maintain transparency.
